articles.content:

articles.title: Lizzo Joked About Being Pregnant With Chris Evans' Baby In Her Hilarious "SNL" Monologue - BuzzFeed
articles.description: "I have no idea where that one started."
articles.content:
Suzanne Cordeiro / AFP via Getty Images
Lizzo actually did make history later in the show, as SNL's first-ever musical guest to introduce herself.
